00001 #import <Cocoa/Cocoa.h>
00002 
00004 //  ACCESSOR MACROS
00005 //  
00006 //  These macros may be used in the document .m file
00007 //  to generate accessors
00008 //
00009 //  Note: SSBIDA = Sheep Systems Built-In Document Accessor
00011 
00012 // for objects (O)
00013 #define SSBIDAO(NAME,SETNAME,KEY) - (void)SETNAME:(id)in { \
00014         [self setObject:in forKey:KEY] ; \
00015 } \
00016 \
00017 - (id)NAME { \
00018         return [self objectForKey:KEY] ; \
00019 } \
00020 
00021 // for integer (I)
00022 #define SSBIDAI(NAME,SETNAME,KEY) - (void)SETNAME:(int)in { \
00023         [self setInteger:in forKey:KEY] ; \
00024 } \
00025 \
00026 - (int)NAME { \
00027         return [self integerForKey:KEY] ; \
00028 } \
00029 
00030 // for BOOL (B)
00031 #define SSBIDAB(NAME,SETNAME,KEY) - (void)SETNAME:(BOOL)in { \
00032         [self setBool:in forKey:KEY] ; \
00033 } \
00034 \
00035 - (BOOL)NAME { \
00036         return [self boolForKey:KEY] ; \
00037 } \
00038

00041         NSString* _aggregateKey ;
00042         NSString* _documentKey ;
00043         NSDictionary* _defaultDefaults ;
00044 }
